title: Phillip Schofield interrupts 'thief' Holly Willoughby after catching her live on air
text:

Phillip Schofield called out Holly Willoughby on today's This Morning for being a "thief".

The presenter spotted his co-host stealing part of the show's set during a phone-in with Vanessa Feltz and claimed viewers had "witnessed theft on television".

Just as Holly was previewing the upcoming Halloween segment, Phillip interrupted to ask Holly what she was doing with a tiny pumpkin in her hands.

He asked: "What are you doing? You’ve had that for the whole phone-in."

Giggling Holly didn't no what to say as she tried to hide the little pumpkin under her arm.

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

Explaining herself, she said: "i looked at it and thought you know what its the perfect pumpkin and I want to take it home."

Phil replied: "So we’ve just witnessed theft on television. We all watched you take it."

Placing the pumpkin under her arm, Holly joked: "I’m very relaxed. Nothing to see here."

(Image: ITV)

(Image: ITV)

Mischievous Holly then let the pumpkin roll onto the floor across the studio.

See you after the break," said Holly, before pointing at the pumpkin and adding: "That's mine!"

Following the adverts, Phillip was still talking about "pumpkin-gate" and trying to establish Holly's motives.

(Image: ITV)

She explained: "It looked like the perfect little pumpkin and I wanted to see how it felt."

Phillip delivered the shocking blow that the little pumpkin was not actually real.

"It does seem nice," admitted Phil. "Not sure I would have stolen it live on telly. There's one less in here."

(Image: ITV)

Someone of the production team had picked up the pumpkin from the floor and placed it back on the table.

After spotting it again, Holly said: "I'll find it. I know which one it is. Come on we’ve got a show to do."

*This Morning airs weekdays on ITV at 10.30am
description: Phillip Schofield called out his This Morning co-host after spotting her snatching part of the set during a phone-in
